description: An imaginative and humorous encounter at a coffee shop where Ben's coffee comes to life.
title: Mugged by Coffee
n_1: In the bustling coffee shop, Sarah hands a steaming, whimsically designed mug to a bewildered Ben.
n_2: Ben's eyes widen as the coffee in the mug stirs into a lively face, playfully 'mugging' him.
n_3: Sarah giggles at Ben's astonished reaction to the coffee's antics.
n_4: Their laughter fills the air, the coffee shop brimming with joy and surprise.
c1_4: Glad you liked our little show!
